title: aggregate-metadata 'impossible' for some reason in dicoms
body:
#### What is the problem?
Finished aggregating (4h), reported 1 impossible (good that I saved full log):
```shell
(git)smaug:/mnt/btrfs/datasets-meta6-2/datalad/crawl[master]git
$> grep impossible .git/logs/aggregate-1.log
aggregate_metadata(impossible): /mnt/btrfs/datasets-meta6-2/datalad/crawl/dicoms [No matching aggregated metadata in Dataset at /mnt/btrfs/datasets-meta6-2/datalad/crawl]
  aggregate_metadata (error: 4, impossible: 1, ok: 490)
(dev)3 10909.....................................:Tue 13 Feb 2018 07:40:33 AM EST:.
(git)smaug:/mnt/btrfs/datasets-meta6-2/datalad/crawl[master]git
$> ls /mnt/btrfs/datasets-meta6-2/datalad/crawl/dicoms
dartmouth-phantoms/  datapackage.json  dcm2niix-tests/  rosetta/
(dev)3 10910.....................................:Tue 13 Feb 2018 07:40:43 AM EST:.
(git)smaug:/mnt/btrfs/datasets-meta6-2/datalad/crawl[master]git
$> cat /mnt/btrfs/datasets-meta6-2/datalad/crawl/dicoms/.datalad/config 
[datalad "dataset"]
	id = 5500090e-7aea-11e6-b268-002590f97d84
[metadata]
	nativetype = frictionless_datapackage
(dev)3 10911.....................................:Tue 13 Feb 2018 07:40:53 AM EST:.
(git)smaug:/mnt/btrfs/datasets-meta6-2/datalad/crawl[master]git
$> cat /mnt/btrfs/datasets-meta6-2/datalad/crawl/dicoms/datapackage.json 
{
  "name": "Collections of DICOM files",
  "title": "Various collections of DICOM files which could be used for software and methods testing",
  "homepage": "http://datasets.datalad.org/?dir=/dicoms",
  "license" : {
      "type": "odc-pddl",
      "url": "http://opendatacommons.org/licenses/pddl/"
  },
  "keywords": [ "DICOM", "NeuroImaging" ], 
  "contributors": [
    {
      "name": "Yaroslav Halchenko",
      "email": "debian@onerussian.com"
    }
  ],
  "author": "DataLad Team <team@datalad.org>"
}
```
so looks like it should have been ok... need to look in detail later
